skills.name: AIR STRIKE
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• Marks can be consumed with Perfect Hits to deal additional true damage.

skills.name: BREAK
desc: • 50% Chance to Remove 2 Beneficial Effects from all enemies.
• Permadeath prevents the target from being revived if they die.

skills.name: EXPLODE
desc: Explodes upon death, dealing true damage to all enemies based on the [32CD32]MAX HP[-] of you and the enemy.
